title: Font - Good Bye Lenin !
content:
Hi everybody,

Does anyone know the name of the typeface used on this Good Bye Lenin poster ?

Thank you for your help !

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419072034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/good-bye-lenin-6_5473.jpg)
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
Knockout No. 68 Full Featherweight seems a likely candidate (with added distressing):  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/styles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419072034/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/styles/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/styles/")

Grotzek Condensed Bold by Feliciano is another option:  
 [http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/cms/fonts/grotzec-condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419072034/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/cms/fonts/grotzec-condensed "http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/cms/fonts/grotzec-condensed")
